entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy in onshore winds with flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy except cloudy in onshore winds with flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
